title: gamemode
description: Sets a player's game mode. See more in the [Popular Commands documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandspopularcommands#gamemode).

fields.title: player
fields.description: A player name `string` or [`target selector`](https://learn.microsoft.com/minecraft/creator/documents/commandsintroduction#target-selectors) to identify the player.

overloads.title: Set game mode with enum
overloads.description: Set a player's game mode using the gamemode `enum`.

overloads.title: Set game mode with integer
overloads.description: Set a player's game mode using an `integer`.
